scripts.build:docs: documentation build --access public --access undefined --config .documentation.yml --format html --output dist/docs/api --shallow src/xcoobee/sdk/index.js src/xcoobee/sdk/Bees.js src/xcoobee/sdk/Config.js src/xcoobee/sdk/ConfigUtils.js src/xcoobee/sdk/Consents.js src/xcoobee/sdk/ErrorResponse.js src/xcoobee/sdk/Inbox.js src/xcoobee/sdk/PagingResponse.js src/xcoobee/sdk/Response.js src/xcoobee/sdk/Sdk.js src/xcoobee/sdk/SuccessResponse.js src/xcoobee/sdk/System.js src/xcoobee/sdk/Users.js
scripts.doc:serve: documentation serve --access public --access undefined --config .documentation.yml --format html --shallow --watch src/xcoobee/sdk/index.js src/xcoobee/sdk/Bees.js src/xcoobee/sdk/Config.js src/xcoobee/sdk/ConfigUtils.js src/xcoobee/sdk/Consents.js src/xcoobee/sdk/ErrorResponse.js src/xcoobee/sdk/Inbox.js src/xcoobee/sdk/PagingResponse.js src/xcoobee/sdk/Response.js src/xcoobee/sdk/Sdk.js src/xcoobee/sdk/SuccessResponse.js src/xcoobee/sdk/System.js src/xcoobee/sdk/Users.js
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:sequential && npm run test:integration:parallel
